I've started a side project I wanted to let everyone know about, the Yakuza=
 Film Rundown:

www.yakuzafilm.com

I'll be giving a rundown of 1-2 Yakuza =
films a month, which will are chosen by you, the readers - the next movie w=
ill be Takashi Miike's "Like a Dragon", which beat out "Deadly Outlaw: REKK=
A" and "Yakuza Demon", after which I'll have up another poll so you can vot=
e on the next movie.  The first rundown is available - Takashi Miike's 2002=
 "Graveyard of Honor", as well as a post detailing the AnimEigo release and=
 Extras DVD.  Rather than keeping it a straight review, I try to mix it up,=
 keep it conversational, and add as many pertinent and entertaining links a=
nd images into the text as I can find, trying to give it a more "multimedia=
" feel. 

Look for the "Like a Dragon" rundown soon.  I hope you enjoy the =
blog.
